title: Top 5 origin countries of refugees admitted to Canada in 2016
summary: This statistic shows the percentage of worldwide refugees to Canada in 2016 , sorted admitted Country .
It was found that 1354 % of global Canada refugees were from Afghanistan , whereas approximately one quarter of refugees to the search platform came from the Syria .
gold: This statistic shows the top five origin counties of refugees that were admitted to Canada in 2016 . Syria topped the list in 2016 with 33,266 refugees from the country admitted into Canada .
